From the stack trace, it looks like you have a detail formatter defined with a
for loop in its code. Is it possible to get info about this detail formatter ?

Fixed.
There was a problem in the autoboxing support, the case of string concatenation
with an Object as parameter was no correctly managed.
A simpler test case is the evaluation of :
"test" + new Object()

ASTInstruction compiler - modified to correctly indicate if an instruction has
been added to outbox a value.
